channel.title: 🏢 Purdue University on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Purdue University on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Can Language Models Replace Programmers? REPOCOD Says 'Not Yet'
item.description: REPOCOD benchmark exposes current LLMs’ struggles with real-world, complex code generation tasks, pushing the field towards building stronger, more context-aware models.
